text:
This came up in a conversation with @GaelVaroquaux at Brainhack Paris, 2016.

Would it be possible to identify clusters on a thresholded stats map and then automatically plot n_clusters plots with cut_coords at the center of each cluster?
title: automatically list clusters centers

text:
@crowledj May be this could help in getting started
